title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Meet the KitchedAid 5 Stand Mixer: simple, strong, and easy to use.

What it does for you:
- Mixes, whips, and kneads so your hands can rest.
- Makes big batches: up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in one go.
- Runs smoothly and evenly, so there are no dry spots in your batter.

Easy to handle:
- Tilt-head design: lift the head up to add ingredients, then lower to mix.
- Clear, labeled speed dial with 10 gentle-to-strong speeds.
- Large 5-quart stainless steel bowl with a comfortable handle; it’s dishwasher safe.
- Pouring shield helps keep flour from puffing out of the bowl.

Built to last:
- Durable metal construction feels sturdy on the counter and doesn’t wobble.
- Reliable “planetary” mixing reaches around the bowl with 59 touch points for thorough mixing.

What’s in the box:
- 5-quart stainless steel bowl
- Coated flat beater (for cake batters, cookie dough, mashed potatoes)
- Coated dough hook (for bread and pizza dough)
- 6-wire whip (for whipped cream, egg whites)
- Pouring shield (for cleaner mixing)

Make it yours:
- Comes in more than 20 colors to match your kitchen.
- You can add over 10 optional attachments later (sold separately) for tasks like slicing, grating, or making pasta—these attach at the front hub.

In short: the KitchedAid 5 is easy to use, easy to clean, and strong enough for everyday baking. Set it on the counter, choose your speed, and let it do the hard work for you.
